delete.description: Delete contact person mapping for a person

jsonData.description: Custom defined fields for that group membership

childId.description: The ID of the child that the relationship is created to

childRelationshipType.description: The type of the relationship of the child, e.g son, daughter

parentRelationshipType.description: The type of the relationship of the parent, e.g father, mother

custody.description: Whether the parent has custody of the child

physical.description: Whether the parent is the biological parent of the child

realParent.description: Whether the parent is currently a parent of the child

parentId.description: The ID of the parent that the relationship is created to

childRelationshipType.description: The type of the relationship of the child, e.g son, daughter

parentRelationshipType.description: The type of the relationship of the parent, e.g father, mother

custody.description: Whether the parent has custody of the child

physical.description: Whether the parent is the biological parent of the child

realParent.description: Whether the parent is currently a parent of the child

personId.description: The ID of the person to join the group

entryDate.description: The date when the person should join the group

grade.description: The grade where to join the group. Defaults to 1

personId.description: The ID of the person that the relationship is for

relationshipType.description: The type of the relationship, e.g. father, mother, child, etc.

custody.description: Whether the person has custody of the related person

physical.description: Whether the person is the biological parent of the related person

realParent.description: Whether the person is currently a parent of the related person

roles.description: A list of roles the person has in the group. Roles can be inactive or active

active.description: Whether this role is currently active

RoleDto.description: A list of roles the person has in the group. Roles can be inactive or active

fieldType.description: The type of the field, e.g. 'text', 'number', 'date', etc.

usage.description: Where the UDF is used, e.g 'person', 'address
